thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 5 of 67
thread.title: Ahmed Taha

author: Ahmed Taha
title: Ahmed Taha
text:
i have been working with WP for a while now and as a web designer / dev for the past 10 years. Templatemonster's templates are bit pricy to say the least, but its all worth it with there customer support, eager to help, patient and informed, exactly what you need them to be :D :D
after my 9th website template from them I highly recommend them to anyone I know
